name: Air Ball (Joh)
description:
Chrome recommended for browser version. (PC version remains best)

Direct a team of people trying to keep the ball in the air! You know when you pass by such a scene, you can't help to want to join in! Well, make sure to recruit everyone passing by for the largest group possible.

People fit different classes with their own abilities, organise the placement and angle of hit for all the members to reach the highest hit count!

Game made in 72h for LD 46

M to mute
8 for screenshot
Note: mouse wheel shouldn't be used

Game: Joh
Music by Eric Matyas
